description: After getting just a taste of Sean Cody on his first visit here, Barron came back wanting more…and who could blame him? Daniel was more than happy to show the new guy a good time, and after seeing each other for the first time, they skipped the formalities and went right to the sweaty fun! By the end of it all, Barron was drenched in cum, and Daniel marveled at his cum-covered bottom… “You fucken rocked it!”
title: Daniel & Barron: Bareback
